title: Is studying BSc have scope? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes… not only B.Sc., every course has its own scope, the thing is how much knowledge you acquired and how you can apply that is the question. B.Sc., course has a good scope in terms of success and value addition to individual as well as to society, research, career growth, employment etc. Most of the students choosing this course for employment, but apart from employment studying science will gives you analytical thinking, base for research, understanding capacity, etc. thanks

If you are thinking about the Job Just after B.Sc. than BSc is worst degree than ITI. A ITI has more scope for the job. Or You are willing to get higher degree M. Sc .or PhD and interested to pure science than you can opt B. Sc. However I would recommend go for four years degree program (BS, B. Tech or BE), these program will offer many gate than the simple 3 year B. Sc.
